description: PROPS built a decentralized video application ecosystem. The ecosystem uses the PROPS token as an economic incentive system to motivate users, video creators and platform developers to maintain this ecosystem. When a video creator creates a compelling content, it gets token rewards from the PROPS platform and users. When the ecosystem's APP developer contributes amazing features, he can also get rewards from the platform, and when users use these features, they can use the props token directly to pay the relevant fees. This is a benign circular ecosystem where users, creators and platform developers can enjoy the benefits of building an ecological ecosystem.
name: Props
